mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCTSEQ, NAME, QUANTITY, PRICE, COMMENTS, INDATE ) VALUES ( PRODUCTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{comments}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTSEQ, NAME, QUANTITY, PRICE, COMMENTS, INDATE FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY INDATE
SELECT PRODUCTSEQ, NAME, QUANTITY, PRICE, COMMENTS, INDATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCTSEQ=#{productSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOLD ( SOLDSEQ, CUSTOMERID, PRODUCTSEQ, INDATE, QUANTITY ) VALUES ( SOLDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{customerId}, #{productSeq}, sysdate, #{quantity} )
mapper.select: SELECT QUANTITY FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCTSEQ=#{productSeq}

SELECT P.NAME AS NAME, P.PRICE AS PRICE, P.COMMENTS AS COMMENTS, S.INDATE AS INDATE, S.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, P.PRICE * S.QUANTITY AS PRICEALL FROM SOLD S, PRODUCT P WHERE S.PRODUCTSEQ = P.PRODUCTSEQ AND S.CUSTOMERID=#{customerId}
